meanings.definition: A semiconductor device that converts light into an electrical current.
meanings.sent1: The photodiode in the solar calculator helps it work even on cloudy days.
meanings.sent2: The security camera uses a photodiode to detect motion at night.
meanings.sent3: The photodiode at the heart of the automatic night light is always ready to shine.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like photodiodes, absorbing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The photodiode hummed softly as it transformed sunlight into energy.

meanings.definition: A type of diode that is sensitive to light.
meanings.sent1: The photodiode in the remote control responds to the TV's signals.
meanings.sent2: In the darkroom, the photodiode ensures precise exposure of the film.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat kept trying to play with the photodiode in the sensor.
meanings.sent4: His mood was like a photodiode, changing with every flicker of light.
meanings.sent5: The photodiode blinked rapidly as it detected the incoming laser beam.
